item.title: 1: Indian Economy on the eve of Independence
2. The Recovery of India
item.description: Contents 5.1 Histograms Important links Visible Hand: Public Policy and Economic Growth in the Nehru Rea The Recovery of India Introduction Paper written by PB in 2007 when Indian economy was growing at around 9% (constant prices). A certain despodency induced by a sense of an allegedly “wasted past”. Some have blamed Nehru and the policies adopted under his leadership. These are serious allegations that need to be addressed.
